summary: Just put them where racemenu presets belongs...
descriptionHtml:
Well,I do intended to make my characters followers,but I'm really suck at CK and I can't use it anyway...
So,I decided to put my favourite characters here,so that not only I can share them with you guys,but also I got myself a backup.
If you ever been to Loverslab,you might have seen these girls from my story Mr.Biko,if you haven't,it's ok coz I just wanna share XD...


[size=5]Be free to use them as your character or make standalone followers from them,if you do make them standalone followers,I'll be glad and will download at the first sight since like I said,I'm suck at CK.

Version 0.2 now available,Elenor is added,and I'm still trying to understand Nexus system...
If anything goes wrong,just tell me,I'm eager to hear from you guys!
[/size]

Version:Second!(More will come soon!)

So,May I interest you with my beautiful girls?

Fresh uploaded,my personal favorite,[i][color=#00ffff][size=3]High mage Elenor[/size][/color][/i]
She's a lively,sexy formal Judicial,and did I mentioned she has a teenage daughter?

[img]http://i.imgur.com/7gwPeQn.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/8uQzJqy.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/2UIUuy8.jpg[/img]



And we have [size=3][i][color=#ffff00]'Shewolf' Varkia[/color],
[/i][/size]She's blonde,she's nord,and...she's a dodgy racist...

[img]http://i.imgur.com/H2VEhh8.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/j3kPHYb.jpg[/img]



Then,allow me to introduce you to [i][color=#f4f4f4][size=4]'Deadeye' Drana[/size][/color][/i]
A mysterious sniper and a experienced infiltrater,except a little bit naive...

[img]http://i.imgur.com/p71Jq0k.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/DpoAPoI.jpg[/img]



So,You will need following mods.


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7127/?]RAN's headmesh (variant B)
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20343/?]Ran's eye reflection extender
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS hairdos renewal
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?]Seductive lips HD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu(of course)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Texture RenewalÂ 
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D13722%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Eyes of beauty(I use so many eye mods,if it does not fit,you can just swap it with your own)


[/url]All credits go to the authors of mods I mentioned above!
author: Luciver0316
